stripped_text: The first time the Corp gains credits through a card ability each turn, you may gain 1 credit. click, 3 credits: Trash PAD Tap. Only the Corp can use this ability.
text:
The first time the Corp gains credits through a card ability each turn, you may gain 1[credit].
[click], 3[credit]: Trash PAD Tap. Only the Corp can use this ability.
title: PAD Tap
